CodeList.Name: Functional Activities Questionnaire-NACC Version Questionnaire Test Code

Description.TranslatedText: Functional Activities Questionnaire-NACC Version test code.

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Activities Questionnaire-NACC - Writing checks, paying bills, or balancing a checkbook.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FAQ-NACC Version - Write checks, Pay bills, Balance checkbook

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Activities Questionnaire-NACC - Assembling tax records, business affairs, or other papers.
Functional Activities Questionnaire-NACC - Shopping alone for clothes, household necessities, or groceries.
Functional Activities Questionnaire-NACC - Playing a game of skill such as bridge or chess, working on a hobby.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FAQ-NACC Version - Play Game of Skill, Work on Hobby

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Activities Questionnaire-NACC - Heating water, making a cup of coffee, turning off the stove.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FAQ-NACC Version - Heat water, Make Coffee, Turn Off Stove

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Activities Questionnaire-NACC - Preparing a balanced meal.
Functional Activities Questionnaire-NACC - Keeping track of current events.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FAQ-NACC Version - Keep Track of Current Events

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Activities Questionnaire-NACC - Paying attention to and understanding a TV program, book, or magazine.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FAQ-NACC Version - Pay Attention, Understand, Discuss

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Activities Questionnaire-NACC - Remembering appointments, family occasions, holidays, medications.
Functional Activities Questionnaire-NACC - Traveling out of the neighborhood, driving, or arranging to take public transportation.

CodeList.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: Functional Activities Questionnaire-NACC Version Questionnaire Test Code
CodeList.nciodm:PreferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire FAQ-NACC Version Test Code Terminology
